_header: He that will in Eastcheap eat a goose so fat
_description: Advice against extravagant living, ‘secundum Aristotilem’ — one quatrain (abab)

CamTCC599.Transcription:
He that wyll in Eschepe ete a goose so fatWith harpe pype and
                    songHe must slepe in Newgate on a matBe the nyght neuer so
                    long
